<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sets the default HR Case transfer method based on the following:
     On upgrade - use Standard (legacy) method
     On Zboot - use Reclassify method</description>
        <name>Set default HR transfer method</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var property = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
property.addQuery('name', 'sn_hr_core.reclassify_default_transfer');
property.addQuery('value', true);
property.query();

var transferUtil;

if (property.next())
	transferUtil = new ReclassifyCaseTransfer();
else
	transferUtil = new StandardCaseTransfer();


if (new hr_TransferCase().setDefaultTransferMethod(transferUtil.getConfigurationId()))
	gs.info("Fix Script: Setting '" + transferUtil.type + "' as the default HR Case transfer type");
else
	gs.info("Fix Script: Unable to set '" + transferUtil.type + "' as the default HR Case transfer type");
	]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
